titleStmt.title: A strange metamorphosis of man, transformed into a vvildernesse Deciphered in characters.
titleStmt.author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper, and are to be sold by Lawrence Chapman at his shop in Holborne,

notesStmt.note: The last two leaves are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
